statements: SELECT * FROM financial_system_vulnerabilities;
SELECT username, amount FROM financial_system_vulnerabilities WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, username FROM financial_system_vulnerabilities WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM financial_system_vulnerabilities ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, username, amount FROM financial_system_vulnerabilities WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_system_vulnerabilities WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, amount FROM financial_system_vulnerabilities WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY username, amount DESC;
SELECT id, username, amount FROM financial_system_vulnerabilities WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM financial_system_vulnerabilities WHERE username = 'admin' OR username = 'user1' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, username, amount FROM financial_system_vulnerabilities WHERE password != 'secure123' ORDER BY amount DESC, username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = '12345';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id = '12345';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = '54321' AND amount > 100;
SELECT username, description FROM users INNER JOIN transactions ON users.id = transactions.user_id WHERE amount < 50;
SELECT id, username, amount FROM users LEFT JOIN transactions ON users.id = transactions.user_id;
SELECT transaction_id, users.username, transactions.amount FROM transactions JOIN users ON transactions.user_id = users.id WHERE amount <= 500;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM accounts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, balance FROM users JOIN accounts ON users.user_id = accounts.user_id WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31';
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_id, user_id, balance FROM accounts WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT username, balance FROM users JOIN accounts ON users.user_id = accounts.user_id
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT user_id, log_message FROM logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 5000
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM logs
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, email, password FROM users ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT u.username, a.account_number, t.amount FROM users u JOIN accounts a ON u.user_id = a.user_id JOIN transactions t ON t.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT p.amount, a.balance FROM payments p INNER JOIN accounts a ON p.account_id = a.account_id WHERE p.amount < a.balance;
